statements.select:
WITH MenuList (MenuID, HierID, MenuLevel, SeqNo) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as MenuID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , 1 AS MenuLevel , CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SeqNo FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
And AA.ID = #MenuGroup#
AND AA.ParentID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as MenuID , CAST(BB.HierID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , BB.MenuLevel + 1 AS MenuLevel , CAST(BB.SeqNo + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SeqNo FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MenuList BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.MenuID ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HierID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.MenuName , AA.ParentID , AA.MenuType , M1.Name as MenuTypeName , AA.SortOrder , AA.MenuPath , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, BB.HierID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.MenuLevel -1) * 5) + BB.SeqNo + '. ' + AA.MenuName AS HierName , BB.MenuLevel
FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MenuList BB ON AA.ID = BB.MenuID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.MenuType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'MenuType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.MenuName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.MenuName , AA.ParentID , AA.MenuType , AA.SortOrder , AA.MenuPath , AA.UseYn , AA.Description , BB.ViewID , BB.Parameter FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TMenuView BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.MenuID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TMenu ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, MenuName, MenuType, ParentID, SortOrder, MenuPath, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #MenuName#, #MenuType#, #ParentID#, #SortOrder#, #MenuPath#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TMenu SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, MenuName = #MenuName# , MenuType = #MenuType# , ParentID = #ParentID# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# , MenuPath = #MenuPath# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
